title: Maille Vinaigrette Dressing
directions: Mix Maille(R) Old Style or Honey Dijon Mustard, balsamic vinegar, lemon juice and a pinch of salt until well blended.
Pour in oil, little by little, and mix until well blended. Add salt and pepper to taste. Serve over your favorite salad mix. Add a tasty cheese, some pecans, grapes or apple slices.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon Maille Old Style Mustard or Honey Dijon Mustard, or more to taste
2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar, or more to taste
